dance.name: On The Way To The Printing Shop
dance.author: Giulio Dujany, Pascaline Latour and Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
dance.kind: 32-bar jig for three couples in a four-couple longwise set
dance.deviser-details:
During Summer School 2019, we talked over lunch about the story of Niols
writing his tune “En marchant pour aller composer des trucs”. This led to us
devising this dance together to go along with it.

instructions.content:
1st couple lead down and up, finishing in 1st place in promenade hold. 2nd
and 3rd join in the middle of the set in promenade hold.

1st, 2nd and 3rd couples dance a progressive promenade, finishing with 2nd
couple in first place and 1st couple in second place in the middle of the
set facing their first corners.

2nd, 1st and 3rd couples dance corners pass and turn, finishing in order
2, 1, 3 on own sides.
2nd, 1st and 3rd couples dance six hands round and back.
